articles.title: What Do Trump's Racism, Expensive Eggs, and a Bird Flu Pandemic Have in Common? - Common Dreams
articles.description: Trump’s no longer president, but he and his racism could still be responsible for millions more American deaths from a new pandemic disease. How and why? I’ll explain in just a moment, but first let’s look at the disease itself.

articles.author: James Callery
articles.title: Experts concerned about how far bird flu is spreading around the world - Daily Mail
articles.description: Avian influenza has been detected as far away as South America. The virus has also killed mammals such as sea lions, mink, foxes and otters.
articles.content:
Experts have expressed concern about how far across the world bird flu is spreading and say its growth should be closely monitored.
